nodes.text: City Plaza, also known as Central Plaza, was a plaza in Crystal City on the planet Christophsis.

The Galactic Republic forces captured City Plaza to use as a landing zone during the Battle of Christophsis. During a lull in the battle, Padawan Ahsoka Tano's shuttle landed in City Plaza, where it was met by Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
